metadata.name: /Imagine...
metadata.description:
During the early stages of AI generative art, people would type "/Imagine" as a prompt to request the AI to generate the desired image. 

But instead of showcasing the AI-generated artworks in the gallery, I've decided to flip the script and exhibit the prompt itself as a work of art.

Prompt is Art, it represents a memorable moment in the history of art. It signifies that art is not just limited to human imagination but also involves the collaboration between humans and AI.
